com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.sessions.impl

Interface MarkingStore

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DocumentSession, InlineCheckCallback, InlineCheckSession
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DocumentSessionImpl, GenericOffsetBasedMarkingStore, InlineCheckCallbackCorrectionProxyImpl, NotifyingInlineCheckCallback

    public interface MarkingStore
    The MarkingStore is used to store and restore the markings of the document if the toggle markings command is executed. If your integration does not support a toggle button you could use NULL instead of implementing an own store.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static MarkingStore NULL
      If your integration does not support a toggle button you could use NULL instead of implementing an own store.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void hideAndStoreMarkings()
      This method hides all markings.
      void restoreMarkings()
      This method re-displays all markings.

    • Field Detail

      • NULL

        static final MarkingStore NULL
        If your integration does not support a toggle button you could use NULL instead of implementing an own store.

    • Method Detail

      • hideAndStoreMarkings

        void hideAndStoreMarkings()
        This method hides all markings. It is called when the user clicks on the toggle markings button. It is only called if markings are present. You have to iterate over the text and store markings information.
        Note: You must also implement restoreMarkings().

      • restoreMarkings

        void restoreMarkings()
        This method re-displays all markings. It is called if the user clicks on the toggle markings button a second time. It is only called if markings are present and only if hideAndStoreMarkings() is called before. You have to iterate over the stored marking information and restore markings in text.
        Note: You must also implement hideAndStoreMarkings().
